item.title: Exploring the NYPD Misconduct Complaint Database
item.description: The NYPD Misconduct Complaint Database Our slides Source code Hosting the slides to this website A non-exhaustive list of related reports My cohort-mate and fellow R wonk, Paul Bloom, and I presented these slides for Columbia Foundations for Research Computing. Our presentation focused on cleaning and plotting data on civilian allegations of NYPD misconduct from the New York Civil Liberties Union. The NYPD Misconduct Complaint Database From the NYCLU:
